meaningMnemonic: 頼む is "to ask for" or "to request." This word is <vocabulary>to rely on</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to trust</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to depend on</vocabulary>. You know it is this word because it is <reading>ru</reading>de to rely on your friends, but you are anyways.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a bit different from 頼む, however. It's たよ, because you go to rely on your friends so much they become <reading>tiyored</reading> (たよ). They say "tired" like that, for some reason.
